item.title: SOLAMI: Social Vision-Language-Action Modeling for Immersive Interaction with 3D Autonomous Characters
item.description: SOLAMI: enabling immersive, natural interactions with 3D characters via a unified social vision-language-action model and a novel synthetic multimodal dataset.
